citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The facilities remaining full time Attending Veterinarian (AV) left on the 17th of November, and as of the beginning of
inspection, there was no written program of veterinary care establishing a formal arrangement with an AV. The part time
veterinarian confirmed verbally that he agreed to act as the AV starting immediately after the full time AV left during
inspection. A part time attending veterinarian or consultant arrangements shall include a written program of veterinary
care and regularly scheduled visits to the premises in order to ensure the welfare of the animals.
Corrected at the time of inspection on 26 November, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the manager and animal care staff.
Additional Inspectors:
Geoffrey Olsen, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The facilities remaining full time Attending Veterinarian (AV) left on the 17th of November, and as of the beginning of 
inspection, there was no written program of veterinary care establishing a formal arrangement with an AV. The part time 
veterinarian confirmed verbally that he agreed to act as the AV starting immediately after the full time AV left during 
inspection. A part time attending veterinarian or consultant arrangements shall include a written program of veterinary 
care and regularly scheduled visits to the premises in order to ensure the welfare of the animals. 
 
Corrected at the time of inspection on 26 November, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the manager and animal care staff. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Geoffrey Olsen, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
